text: THE HON. DR. N . M . PERERA, M.P.,
In accordance with the provisions of Section 35 (1) of the Monetary Law Act (Cap. 422), I submit herewith the Twenty-second Annual Report
of the Monetary Board of the Central Bank of Ceylon covering the Bank's operations during the year 1971.
Acting Permanent Secretary to the Ministry of Finance.
P. V. M. FERNANDO Senior Assistant to the Governor
H . L. D . SELVARATNAM Assistant to the Governor
A. C. P. GUNASEKERA Assistant to the Governor
Bank Supervision Department: J. G. P. JAYASUNDERA Director Economic Research Department:
H . N . S. KABUNATILAKE Acting Additional Director
C. H . FERNANDO Superintendent Establishments Department: E. ERAMTJDUGOLLA - Director

Internal Audit Department: M. P. PERERA— Acting Internal Auditor
Public Debt Department-. D. R. SIRIWARDENE — Acting Superintendent
Secretariat: L. W . A. WEEKASEKERA - - - - - Secretary
Auditor - General to the Ceylon Government.

P R E F A C E
THIS, THE TWENTY-SECOND ANNUAL REPORT OF THE MONETARY BOARD
OF THE CENTRAL BANK OF CEYLON, IS ISSUED IN ACCORDANCE WITH
SECTION 35 OF THE MONETARY LAW ACT (CAP. 4 2 2 ) .
THE BANK'S FINANCIAL YEAR IS THE CALENDAR YEAR. THE FOLLOWING
REPORT IS CONCERNED PRIMARILY WITH THE YEAR 1971.
